hero.title: A Dignified Farewell with the Beauty of Flowers
hero.subtitle: Funeral wreaths created with love and respect for your loved ones
hero.description: In the difficult moments of farewell, we help you express love and respect through beautiful floral arrangements. Each wreath is created with sensitivity, care, and understanding for your loss.

philosophy.quote: Life is fragile as butterfly dust, but beauty and love remain forever
philosophy.text: We understand that life is fragile as butterfly dust and that in one moment our world can change. Our physical form then transforms into another energy. Every day is full of these transformations, visible and invisible. One of these visible transformations is the butterfly, whose natural process is transformation from caterpillar to beautiful creature. Similarly, we perceive the departure to the other side – as a natural transformation that continues in another form.

home.title: Funeral Wreaths
home.subtitle: Premium funeral wreaths and floral arrangements for dignified farewell
home.description: Handcrafted, careful flower selection and fast delivery. We help you express respect and love in difficult times.

items.title: Fresh Flower Guarantee
items.description: We always order flowers fresh based on your order. We guarantee the highest quality and long-lasting freshness of every bloom for a dignified farewell.

items.title: Reliable Custom Delivery
items.description: We deliver products exactly to your specified location at a time that suits you. We understand urgency and ensure timely delivery without stress.

items.title: Careful Handcrafted Work
items.description: We take care in placing every single flower so that the final work is perfect. Each wreath is a unique piece created with love and respect.

items.title: Personalization Options
items.description: You have the option to choose the shape, size, and colors of your funeral wreath according to your own ideas. We help you create a personal and meaningful farewell.

handcrafted.title: Handcrafted
handcrafted.description: Each wreath is carefully crafted by our experienced florists with attention to detail and quality.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: Next-day delivery available. We understand urgency and ensure timely delivery.

personalApproach.title: Personal Approach
personalApproach.description: We help you select or customize a wreath according to your ideas and requirements.

items.question: How to properly store and care for a funeral wreath?
items.answer: If you wish to have the wreath delivered a day or two before the ceremony, we recommend keeping it horizontally in the original box. This ensures that water from the wreath base doesn't drain out. No additional care is needed – the wreath is sufficiently saturated with water and the flowers are treated for maximum longevity.

items.question: How long will the flowers in a funeral wreath stay fresh?
items.answer: The longevity of flowers depends on weather conditions. Generally, the shorter the stem, the longer the durability. Funeral wreaths are intended for display at memorial sites. In summer with high temperatures, the wreath will remain beautiful for one week, while in cooler weather it can last up to two weeks.

items.question: What to do with the wreath after the flowers wilt?
items.answer: We recommend ecological recycling. Dispose of the flowers from the wreath in the collection bin designated for bio waste and the wreath base in plastic recycling. Together we protect nature and ensure responsible handling of materials.

about.title: About Our Floral Workshop
about.mission: We help families express love and respect for their loved ones through beautiful floral arrangements in life's most difficult moments.
about.story: We are a small family floral workshop that approaches our work with sensitivity and attention to every detail. We have been dedicated to flowers for many years and believe that the sphere of funeral flowers deserves more attention and beauty. We put a piece of our heart into each of your orders, so that this sad event in your lives becomes at least a little more pleasant.
about.values: We select each flower with care so that the result of our work meets all your expectations. We always buy flowers fresh, carefully clean and treat them so that they honor the memory of your loved one at the memorial site for as long as possible.
about.commitment: Our commitment is to provide not only beautiful floral arrangements, but also understanding, empathy, and support in difficult times. We believe that quality handwork and personal approach can bring comfort and dignity to the farewell process.
